item.title: Matter Center for Office 365 is now available in GitHub - Office Blogs
item.description:
Matter Center for Office 365 is now available in GitHub - Office Blogs

Office Extensibility exists for a single, simple purpose: make Office more useful by unleashing the creativity of developers to craft purpose-driven, relevant experiences for their users. We're excited about pushing forward our vision of new and better ways for users to be productive.

item.title: New to Office 365 in December-Office Mobile for Windows 10 phone, updates for Apple and Android, Office 365 Planner preview and more - Office Blogs
item.description:
New to Office 365 in December-Office Mobile for Windows 10 phone, updates for Apple and Android, Office 365 Planner preview and more - Office Blogs

It may be the holidays, but we're still hard at work delivering a slate of new apps and features. New Windows 10 phones like the Lumia 950 now ship with Office Mobile. We also have updates for Office for Apple devices, Skype for Business for Android, a preview of Office 365 Planner and new management tools for IT.

item.title: Smarter address book and flight confirmations coming to Outlook on the web - Office Blogs
item.description:
Smarter address book and flight confirmations coming to Outlook on the web - Office Blogs

Stay Informed You send and receive a lot of emails, and it's natural to make mistakes along the way-you forget how to spell someone's name, leave someone out of a group email or forget to add a flight to your calendar.
